Line5.BCBF4: We'll make home wherever we are, love. This is just a place. A place that is dying and cursed.
Line3.BCBFA: I’ve lived here my whole life. I can’t just pick up as easy as you.
Line1.BCBF4: Leave it, Mairi! You don't know what's been infected. The lighter our cart, the faster we can leave these forsaken lands behind us.
